summary: CleanerSkyrim is a project aiming to create a modification to make skyrim more friendly for teens. It removes mainy innapropriate aspects of the game and models of the game but it is still in beta.
descriptionHtml:
CleanerSkyrim is a project aiming to create a modification to make skyrim more friendly for teens. It removes mainy innapropriate aspects of the game and models of the game but it is still in beta.


What this mod does:


-Remove Decapitations...when a character is decapitated it will show nothing, no blood, no head falling off. The perk still insta-kills but the character that is \"decapitated\" doesn\'t get changed, they just look like a regular dead body.
 -Remove Blood...Yes, it removes blood from animals, blood from people, decap blood, blood on your screen when you\'re hurt (don\'t worry, you can still tell if you\'re hurt by the health bar in game), blood that flies on the ground, blood on your sword, blood in the game that is shown as textures. Basically removes all the blood.
 -Removes Inappropriate books...this removes some story books which were inappropriate in the game and edits a few which you might need to read, to make them okay to read while still keeping the context of the book.
 -A bunch of other little things...also removes a bunch of other little things like those ugly burnt corpses and bloody bones, turns the bloody bones into non-bloody ones, burnt corpses into urns with the natural items in them (so you can still loot them!) and a few other small edits!

If you\'d like to contact me or ask me if this mod is compatible with a certain other mod, send me an email at: brinabananas@hotmail.com


If anybody would like to contribute to this mod send me an email at brinabananas@hotmail.com.
author: Gabrielle1

files.name: Dawnguard Update NEXUS MOD MANAGER ONLY
